import React, { useState } from 'react' import {Row, Col, Modal} from 'react-bootstrap' import AccomCard from './AccomCard.js' import ActCard from './ActCard.js' import FlightCard from './FlightCard.js' import ActCRUD from './ActCRUD.js' import FlightCRUD from './FlightCRUD.js' import CollabCard from './CollabCard.js' import AddCollab from './AddCollab.js' import ExpenseCard from './ExpenseCard.js' import ExpenseCRUD from './ExpenseCRUD.js' import NewAccom from './NewAccom.js' import { Button, Card, Grid, Icon } from 'semantic-ui-react' import { AiOutlineUsergroupAdd } from 'react-icons/ai' export default function EventCard(props) { const [show, setShow] = useState(false); const handleClose = () => setShow(false); const handleShow = () => setShow(true); const collabMap = props.collaborators.map(collaborator=> ) const col1 = [] for (let i = 0; i < collabMap.length; i+=4) { col1.push(collabMap[i]) } const col2 = [] for (let i = 1; i < collabMap.length; i+=4) { col2.push(collabMap[i]) } const col3 = [] for (let i = 2; i < collabMap.length; i+=4) { col3.push(collabMap[i]) } const col4 = [] for (let i = 3; i < collabMap.length; i+=4) { col4.push(collabMap[i]) } return (
{props.name}
{props.date}
{props.location}


{/* COLLABORATORS */}
Collaborators
{col1} {col2} {col3} {col4} {col1} {col2} {col3} {col4}
